snippet.title: Ape Escape SSMM - 02 - Mer-Monkeys & Stuff Like That
snippet.description:
Is the lab selectively waterproof or something? If I were to just run it into the lake, it would short-circuit and explode; however, if it's attached to the head of a mer-monkey, it can safely go underwater.

Isn't game logic fun? :D


enjoy.
